DOC.brief_summary: We aim evaluate long-term effect 10 session spinal manipulative therapy apply vertebral region-specific region nonspecific level immediately treatment 3 6 month randomization .
DOC.brief_title: Specific Non-Specific Manipulation Patients With Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate long-term effect 10 session spinal manipulative therapy apply vertebral region-specific region nonspecific level immediately treatment 3 6 month randomization . 148 patient chronic non-specific low back pain enrol clinical trial . Patients undergo specific physical examination order determine ideal lumbar spine level manipulate . The outcomes interest pain intensity , pain pressure threshold , global perceive effect disability associate back pain . After first assessment patient randomly assign two group receive 10 session spinal manipulation period four week , may receive manipulation accord finding physical examination ( specific manipulation ) may receive manipulation upper thoracic region , disregard physical examination finding ( nonspecific manipulation ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients low back pain duration 3 24 month . Exclusion criterion : Patients pain duration low 3 month high 24 month . Patients nerve root compromise serious spinal pathology , Pregnant patient , Previous back surgery Patients contraindication spinal manipulation .
